Question 1
```{r}
top_ten = delays %>% group_by(carrier_name) %>%  summarise(total_delay = sum(arr_delay,na.rm = TRUE)) %>% top_n(10,total_delay) %>% arrange(total_delay)
ggplot(top_ten,aes(x= reorder(carrier_name,total_delay),y = total_delay))+geom_bar(stat='identity' ,color='skyblue',fill='steelblue')+ labs(y = 'Total Delays(in mins)', x = 'Airline')+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1), panel.grid.major.y = element_line(color = 'grey'))
```

Question 2
```{r}
year_delay = delays %>% group_by(carrier_name,year) %>%  summarise(total_delay_year = sum(arr_delay,na.rm = TRUE)) 

year_top_ten= merge(year_delay,top_ten, by = 'carrier_name', all.y = T)

ggplot(year_top_ten, aes(x= reorder(carrier_name,total_delay),y = total_delay_year, fill = as.factor(year)))+geom_bar(type = 'stacked', stat='identity')+ labs(y = 'Total Delays(in mins)', x = 'Airline')+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1), panel.grid.major.y = element_line(color = 'grey'))
```
